name: Datesy Dating
description: Start meeting people nearby with Datesy - an app that makes it easy to find new friends or start a beautiful new relationship.  Whether you are interested in Thai Dating, Filipina Dating, or dating in Asia you should check out Datesy!  What makes Datesy different?   Message anyone - no need to match first. If they reply or like you then you can start a conversation  Easily hide people you dont want to see again - tap and hold their profile in the browse list  Quickly show interest in new members with a double tap  Local dating options lets you see who is in your area and order the results by closest members  Search with more detail including height, weight and more  Two different interfaces for seeing people near you. Choose whichever you prefer  Send photos in messages - after someone has replied to you sending photos is available  Dating in Bangkok, Pattaya, Phuket, Manila, Cebu and all over Asia!  Datesy Premium  While Datesy is free to send and receive messages you can subscribe to Datesy Premium to unlock extra abilities and save time:   No time limit on sending messages to multiple people  No limit on how many people you can like  See who visited your profile and have access to lists  Easily change your location to see people in other areas  Datesy is free to use but there is an option to purchase a monthly subscription within the app. Subscriptions last for 1 month and automatically renew at $19.99/month if not cancelled. You can easily cancel by visiting payments.google.com - selecting Bills and Accounts and then selecting Cancel subscription.   Our Privacy Policy is available at https://www.datesy.com/privacypolicy  Our Terms of Use are available at https://www.datesy.com/terms
